articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: Hyundai updates Ioniq 5 with bigger battery, Tesla-style port - Ars Technica
articles.description: There's also an off-road focused variant called the Ioniq 5 XRT.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ The lifted, rugged, off-road version-of-normal trend has come to the Ioniq 5 with the new XLT.
